actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Commodity Exchange Act to require public disclosure of certain information relating to sales of commodities for export, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Requires, under the Commodity Exchange Act, public disclosure of specified information relating to sales of commodities for export.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Commodity Exchange Act to require public disclosure of certain information relating to sales of commodities for export, and for other purposes.
